CamTCC601.First Lines:
Emperour of all emperours omnipotentPreserue þys empyre in all
                    prosperiteRex Regnum oure Reame & our regentRule & redresse in
                    ryght & equyte…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Whyles ye pray I woll rede storyes of antiquiteAnd I wyll
                    pray whyle ye rede eftsone in lykenesse
CamTCC601.Attributed Title:
hic sequitur paruus tractatus compendiose in Anglicis translatus de
                        magnificencia ecclesie. Audi Israel. Deus tuus viuus est Ihesum adorabis
                        & illi soli seruies…(f. 285va)
